caption.p: eQTL meta-analysis discovers more eQTL than individual cohorts. ( a) Quantile-quantile plot of eQTL from individual cohorts as well as the meta-analysis of the true (black) and permuted (light blue) data. Number of significant eQTL (SNP-gene pairs) ( b) or genes with significant eQTL ( c) as a function of cohort size.
